attributes.contentHtml:
Honestly, you included like no proof as to this, but yeah I can agree that rus is a shady guy, as I have had an experience with him myself.

When I was wishing To purchase something, rus insisted that I wire the money into his credit card, which isn’t a thing in the Uk (he just gave me the CreditCard number). When I explained to him that this wasn’t possible, he then insisted that I pay him via a streamlabs link, I have attached proof of this.

I have also enclosed proof of him just being generally incompetent, and not knowing what he is doing/the costs of doing business. He additionally cancelled my servers after having them for two days as I ‘was using them too much’ and ‘it costs us too much’, when I paid the price he asked, I have also attached this proof

attributes.title: Rus | Lying, reusing nodes, scam hosts
